## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optpassgate">OptPassGate</a></>}>
Extensions to this class implement mechanisms to disable passes and individual optimizations at compile time. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optpassgate/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optbisect">OptBisect</a></>}>
This class implements a mechanism to disable passes and individual optimizations at compile time based on a command line option (-opt-bisect-limit) in order to perform a bisecting search for optimization-related problems. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optbisect/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

This file declares the interface for bisecting optimizations.
